definition: a shrewd or unscrupulous person who knows how to circumvent difficulties
details:
noun
- a shrewd or unscrupulous person who knows how to circumvent difficulties
= synonyms: hustler
- an agent that operates some apparatus or machine
= example: an agent that operates some apparatus or machine
= synonyms: manipulator
- someone who owns or operates a business
= example: someone who owns or operates a business
- a speculator who trades aggressively on stock or commodity markets
- (mathematics) a symbol or function representing a mathematical operation
